e. w. morley.gloss: United States chemist and physicist who collaborated with Michelson in the Michelson-Morley experiment (1838-1923)

ew.gloss: military action involving the use of electromagnetic energy to determine or exploit or reduce or prevent hostile use of the electromagnetic spectrum

ewenki.gloss: a member of the people inhabiting an area of northern Mongolia and eastern Siberia
the Tungusic language of the Evenki in eastern Siberia

ewer.gloss: an open vessel with a handle and a spout for pouring

ewing's sarcoma.gloss: malignant tumor in bone marrow (usually in the pelvis or in long bones)

ewing's tumor.gloss: malignant tumor in bone marrow (usually in the pelvis or in long bones)

ewing's tumour.gloss: malignant tumor in bone marrow (usually in the pelvis or in long bones)
